languages.text: Торговый пост Леместа-1 не первый год мешает торговле Даргонуса, перехватывая купеческий поток из ряда систем, в том числе с горнодобывающего мира Флактика. Если бы какой-нибудь пират получил мотивацию разнести эту станцию торпедами...

The Lemesta I trading outpost has been causing problems for Dargonus's trade for years by attracting merchants arriving from a number of systems, including those from the mining world of Flactica. If only some pirate were motivated enough to blast this station with torpedoes...
languages.original_text: Торговый пост Леместа-1 не первый год мешает торговле Даргонуса, перехватывая купеческий поток из ряда систем, в том числе с горнодобывающего мира Флактика. Если бы какой-нибудь пират получил мотивацию разнести эту станцию торпедами...

languages.text: L'avant-poste commercial Lemesta-I nuit au commerce de Dargonus depuis des années en attirant des marchands en provenance de différents systèmes, dont ceux du monde minier de Flactica. Si seulement un pirate trouvait la motivation d'anéantir cette station avec des torpilles...
languages.original_text: The Lemesta I trading outpost has been causing problems for Dargonus's trade for years by attracting merchants arriving from a number of systems, including those from the mining world of Flactica. If only some pirate were motivated enough to blast this station with torpedoes...

traits.locale_text: L'avant-poste commercial Lemesta-I nuit au commerce de Dargonus depuis des années en attirant des marchands en provenance de différents systèmes, dont ceux du monde minier de Flactica. Si seulement un pirate trouvait la motivation d'anéantir cette station avec des torpilles...

languages.text: レメスタ・I交易基地は、フラクティカのマイニングワールドを含む多くの星系からやってくる商人を引きつけ、ダルゴナスの交易に何年も問題を引き起こしてきた。このステーションを魚雷で爆破できるほど、気合いの入った海賊がいればいいのだが…
languages.original_text: The Lemesta I trading outpost has been causing problems for Dargonus's trade for years by attracting merchants arriving from a number of systems, including those from the mining world of Flactica. If only some pirate were motivated enough to blast this station with torpedoes...

traits.locale_text: レメスタ・I交易基地は、フラクティカのマイニングワールドを含む多くの星系からやってくる商人を引きつけ、ダルゴナスの交易に何年も問題を引き起こしてきた。このステーションを魚雷で爆破できるほど、気合いの入った海賊がいればいいのだが…

languages.text: 多年来，勒梅斯塔一号贸易前哨站抢夺了来自多个星系的行商客源，包括来自矿业世界弗拉提卡的商人，成为了达戈努斯发展贸易的一大障碍。要是有海盗愿意帮忙炸掉这座空间站就好了……
languages.original_text: The Lemesta I trading outpost has been causing problems for Dargonus's trade for years by attracting merchants arriving from a number of systems, including those from the mining world of Flactica. If only some pirate were motivated enough to blast this station with torpedoes...

traits.locale_text: 多年来，勒梅斯塔一号贸易前哨站抢夺了来自多个星系的行商客源，包括来自矿业世界弗拉提卡的商人，成为了达戈努斯发展贸易的一大障碍。要是有海盗愿意帮忙炸掉这座空间站就好了……

languages.text: El comercio de Lemesta I lleva años causando problemas al comercio de Dargonus al atraer a mercaderes de varios sistemas, incluidos los del mundo minero de Flactica. Ojalá algún pirata estuviera lo bastante motivado como para volar esta estación con torpedos...
languages.original_text: The Lemesta I trading outpost has been causing problems for Dargonus's trade for years by attracting merchants arriving from a number of systems, including those from the mining world of Flactica. If only some pirate were motivated enough to blast this station with torpedoes...

traits.locale_text: El comercio de Lemesta I lleva años causando problemas al comercio de Dargonus al atraer a mercaderes de varios sistemas, incluidos los del mundo minero de Flactica. Ojalá algún pirata estuviera lo bastante motivado como para volar esta estación con torpedos...

languages.text: Der Handelsposten Lemesta I ist der Wirtschaft von Dargonus seit Jahren ein Dorn im Auge, weil er Händler aus zahlreichen Systemen anzieht, auch von der Bergbauwelt Flactica. Gäbe es doch nur Piraten, die motiviert genug sind, die Station mit Torpedos zu beschießen ...
languages.original_text: The Lemesta I trading outpost has been causing problems for Dargonus's trade for years by attracting merchants arriving from a number of systems, including those from the mining world of Flactica. If only some pirate were motivated enough to blast this station with torpedoes...

traits.locale_text: Der Handelsposten Lemesta I ist der Wirtschaft von Dargonus seit Jahren ein Dorn im Auge, weil er Händler aus zahlreichen Systemen anzieht, auch von der Bergbauwelt Flactica. Gäbe es doch nur Piraten, die motiviert genug sind, die Station mit Torpedos zu beschießen ...

languages.text: Lemesta I adlı ticari karakol, maden dünyası Flactica gibi birçok sistemden tüccarları cezbederek Dargonus ticaretine yıllardır zarar vermekte. Korsanın biri bu istasyonu torpidolarla havaya uçurmak için teşvik edilse belki...
languages.original_text: The Lemesta I trading outpost has been causing problems for Dargonus's trade for years by attracting merchants arriving from a number of systems, including those from the mining world of Flactica. If only some pirate were motivated enough to blast this station with torpedoes...
